title:
A Dirichlet type problem for non-pluripolar complex Monge-Amp\`ere
  equations
authors: Thai Duong Do, Hoang-Son Do, Van Tu Le, Ngoc Thanh Cong Pham
abstract:
In this paper, we study a Dirichlet type problem for the non-pluripolar
complex Monge - Amp\`ere equation with prescribed singularity on a bounded
domain of $\mathbb{C}^n$. We provide a local version for an existence and
uniqueness theorem proved by Darvas, Di Nezza and Lu. Our work also extends a
result of Ahag, Cegrell, Czyz and Pham.
